status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1kh12","text":"ATG9 HDIR-ATG101:ATG13 complex at  6 mg/ml in 25 mM HEPES pH 7.5, 150mM NaCl, 1mM MgCl2, 1mM TCEP was used as the protein stock","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7rhum","text":"Crystallization was carried out by sitting-drop vapor diffusion using an automated liquid-handling system (Mosquito, TTP LabTech, UK) at 288 K in 96-well plates","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7aalq","text":"The protein solution was mixed with the reservoir buffer composed of 0.1 M HEPES pH 7.5, 0.2 M NaCl, 12% PEG8000 with a ratio of 1:1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ceu69","text":"Crystal trays were checked daily using a light microscopy for crystal growth","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"lqfq","text":"Large crystals were obtained in 2–4 days. Crystals were cryo-protectedin 28% glycerol/reservoir buffer and frozen in liquid N2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":125,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9g9ai","text":"Resuspended pellet in lysis buffer (25 mM HEPES pH 7.5, 200 mM NaCl, 2 mM MgCl2, 1 mM TCEP, 5 mM EDTA, 10% Glycerol) with 1% Triton X-100 and protease inhibitor cocktail (Thermo Scientific, Waltham, MA) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":78,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9tgt9","text":"Harvest Cells   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"500","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"BFFE5808012811EDBE9C0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"mapu","text":"Add mixture to cells. Let cells grow for   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":172800,"guid":"BC820F76012811EDBE9C0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4hisl","text":"Add PEI to DNA dilution. Incubate mixture for    at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":52,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"BA063E87012811EDBE9C0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1800,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"BA063F22012811EDBE9C0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c46v6","text":"Dilute PEI with Warm Hybridoma-SFM(1X), In a separate tube, dilute DNA with Hybridoma-SFM(1X)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cqp42","text":"Transfect HEK GNTI cells at concentration of 2 × 106 cells/ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":51,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"18s55","text":"Wash pellet with cold PBS. Store pellet at -80C until purification or lyse immediately ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fm274","text":"Rock supernatant with equilibrated resin for   at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":45,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3600,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F608DCA1012811EDBE9C0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F608DBFD012811EDBE9C0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"34rv1","text":"Load supernatant onto GST Sepharose resin using a gravity column setup","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dgkn8","text":"Wash GST Sepharose 4B resin into lysis buffer (without Triton)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"agnmr","text":"Clarify lysate for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"17000","duration":2100,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E63C4D2F012811EDBE9C0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c4r0e","text":"Wash with 5CV lysis buffer (25 mM HEPES pH 7.5, 200 mM NaCl, 2 mM MgCl2, 1 mM TCEP, 5 mM EDTA, 10% Glycerol)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":70,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dsaoj","text":"Elute with lysis buffer plus 25 mM glutathione for GST resin","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bcl5a","text":"Add purified His6-TEV protein to cleave GST tag at 4°C overnight","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":16,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1261c","text":"Dilute 5x into SP Buffer buffer A: 30 mM MES pH 6.0, 3 mM beta-mercaptoethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"edhsl","text":"Load sample onto a HiTrap SP HP 5 ml column (GE healthcare, Piscataway, NJ)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"41uo4","text":"Elute from the SP column on a 70 ml linear gradient from 0–500 mM NaCl in SP buffer A. The cleavage sample was eluted at the buffer conductivity of ~ 25 mS/cm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bbrms","text":"After each fraction was analyzed by SDS gel. Fractions containing ATG9 HDIR-ATG101:ATG13 were pooled concentrated in Amicon Ultra15 concentrator (MilliporeSigma, Burlington, MA) and exchanged into 25 mM HEPES pH 7.5, 150mM NaCl, 1mM MgCl2, 1mM TCEP for crystallization.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Purification and Crystallization of ATG9 HDIR-ATG101:ATG13 complex
